messages.message:
Everyone - We’re working on the much requested support for queries to ‘multiple files’ in the Converse app in AI Hub.

We need sample documents, queries and the expected responses in order to create a high quality dataset for testing various approaches and benchmark our performance.

Can you share the examples that you have come across with customers / prospects / your own use cases in this document (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Mr_ivbL240d2J2veUqiMOosYau4RoSfEj1WWbAIY6UI/edit#heading=h.ocdhqj3vn9x7)? Thank you!

@ChrisM @Jarett @joshbronko @Lee @Matt Weaver @Mark @JD @Hari @Rafal @Kerry
